item.title: Redis Enterprise & Open Source
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://redis.com/security/notice-apache-log4j2-cve-2021-44228/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-44228: Not vuln NCSC-NL Redis Enterprise and Open Source Redis (self-managed software product) does not use Java and is therefore not impacted by this vulnerability Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-20 12:37:57 NCSC-NL Updated community note.

item.title: Redis Jedis
